Method Detail

open

public static int open()
Initialize the contactless card reader

Returns:
value == 0, error ; value != 0 , correct handle

close

public static int close()
Close the contactless card reader

Returns:
value >= 0, success ; value < 0, error code

searchTargetBegin

public static int searchTargetBegin(int nCardMode,
                                    int nFlagSearchAll,
                                    int nTimeout_MS)
Start searching the contactless card If you set the nCardMode is auto, reader will try to activate card in type A, type B and type successively; If you set the nCardMode is type A, type B, or type C, reader only try to activate card in the specified way.

Parameters:
: - nCardMode : handle of this card reader possible value : CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_AUTO = 0 CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_TYPE_A = 1; CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_TYPE_B = 2; CONTACTLESS_CARD_MODE_TYPE_C = 3;
nFlagSearchAll - : 0 : signal user if we find one card in the field 1 : signal user only we find all card in the field
nTimeout_MS - : time out in milliseconds. if nTimeout_MS is less then zero, the searching process is infinite.
Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

searchTargetEnd

public static int searchTargetEnd()
Stop the process of searching card.

Returns:
:value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

attachTarget

public static int attachTarget(byte[] byteArrayATR)
Attach the target before transmitting apdu command In this process, the target(card) is activated and return ATRImpl

Parameters:
byteArrayATR - ATRImpl buffer, if you set it null, you can not get the data.
Returns:
:value >= 0, success in starting the process and return length of ATRImpl; value < 0, error code

detachTarget

public static int detachTarget()
Detach the target. If you want to send APDU again, you should attach it.

Returns:
:value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

transmit

public static int transmit(byte[] byteArrayAPDU,
                           int nAPDULength,
                           byte[] byteArrayResponse)
Transmit APDU command and get the response

Parameters:
byteArrayAPDU: - command of APDU
nAPDULength: - length of command of APDU
byteArrayResponse: - response of command of APDU
Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

sendControlCommand

public static int sendControlCommand(int nCmdID,
                                     byte[] byteArrayCmdData,
                                     int nDataLength)
Send control command.

Parameters:
nCmdID - : id of command
byteArrayCmdData - : data associated with command, if no data, you can set it NULL
nDataLength - : data length of command
Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

pollEvent

public static int pollEvent(int nTimeout_MS,
                            ContactlessEvent event)
Parameters:
nTimeout_MS - : time out in milliseconds. if nTimeout_MS is less then zero, the event process is infinite.
event - :
Returns:
value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code
